articles.description: The former vice president was told he will have to give evidence before a grand jury.
articles.content:

articles.title: Yes, Trump's Waco Rally Featured a Song from the 'J6 Prison Choir'
articles.description: The "J6 Prison Choir" comprised a group of about 20 men serving prison sentences for participating in the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.
articles.content:

articles.author: Washington Examiner
articles.title: Trump's Jan. 6 national anthem mashup
articles.description: TRUMP'S JAN. 6 NATIONAL ANTHEM MASHUP. Former President Donald Trump does not usually play the national anthem when he appears at rallies around the country. Trump enters the arena to the strains of Lee Greenwood's "God Bless the USA." He walks around the stage, soaking up his fans' enthusiasm and support, and begins his remarks when the song finishes.
